title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4626.9 - Clerk or department to make written findings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4626.9 - Clerk or department to make written findings

State Regulations

When proceedings respecting the suspension or revocation
of licenses or imposition of fines are begun before the municipal governing
body that issued the license, such municipal governing body shall hear the
matter and make written findings in support of its decision. The licensee and
the commission shall be notified immediately in writing of the decision and, in
the event of a suspension, revocation or imposition of fine, the effective date
thereof. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4626.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
